PickUp.QuestName: In the Rear With the Gear

TurnIn.QuestName: In the Rear With the Gear

PickUp.QuestName: Free Your Mind, the Rest Follows

TurnIn.QuestName: Free Your Mind, the Rest Follows

CustomBehavior.Code: foreach (var aura in new[]{768,783,5487,2645,24858}.Select(id => Me.GetAuraById(id)).Where(a => a != null)) aura.TryCancelAura();

CustomBehavior.TerminateWhen: Unit(41112) == null || Unit(41112, u => u.IsFriendly) != null
Unit(41112) == null || Unit(41112, u => u.IsHostile) != null

CustomBehavior.UseWhen: Me.CurrentTarget != null && Me.CurrentTarget.Entry == 41031 && Me.BagItems.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Entry == 55883).CooldownTimeLeft == TimeSpan.Zero && Me.CurrentTarget.HasAura(77224)

CustomBehavior.Text: This profile is still a work in progress.
